column1: faith_conversion.1001.start0:"With my decision to convert to [new_faith.GetName]
column2: I arranged for a [new_faith.PriestNeuter] to come to my court and conduct the rites.\n\n"

column1: faith_conversion.1001.desc0:"With the fate of my immortal soul in question
column2: I can only pray that I have made the right decision.\n\nMetaphysica aside
column3: faith_conversion.1001.desc.zealous0":"As [template_priest.GetSheHe] recites lines from the [new_faith.ReligiousText] I can #EMP feel#! my conviction burning stronger within me — there is no doubt in my mind that I have chosen the right path.\n\nNo matter how strong my zeal
column4: faith_conversion.1001.desc.zealous.carnal_male0":"As [template_priest.GetSheHe] recites lines from the [new_faith.ReligiousText] I can #EMP feel#! my conviction swelling in size — there is no doubt in my mind that I have chosen the right path.\n\nNo matter how strong my zeal
column5: faith_conversion.1001.desc.zealous.carnal_female0":"As [template_priest.GetSheHe] recites lines from the [new_faith.ReligiousText] I can #EMP feel#! my conviction throbbing within me — there is no doubt in my mind that I have chosen the right path.\n\nNo matter how strong my zeal
column6:
":"
 faith_conversion.1001.desc.compassionate0":"With the fate of my immortal soul in question — as well as the souls of my subjects — I pray that I have made the right decision.\n\nMetaphysica aside
column7: faith_conversion.1001.desc.reincarnation0":"With the life of my next incarnation in question
column8: I pray that I have made the right decision.\n\nMetaphysica aside
column9: faith_conversion.1001.desc.cynical0":"While I don't really believe the drivel that the [new_faith.PriestNeuter] spouts
column10: there were enough political advantages to converting that I knew I needed to do this sooner or later.\n\nRegardless of my reasons

column1: faith_conversion.1001.end.is_vassal.convert_away0:"my most immediate concern is temporal — how will [my_liege.Custom2('MyCharacterIntroduction'
column2: ROOT.Char)] react to learning that I have spurned [my_liege.GetHerHis] faith?"

column1: faith_conversion.1001.end.is_vassal.convert_to0:"I can breathe a sigh of relief in knowing that [my_liege.Custom2('MyCharacterIntroduction'
column2: ROOT.Char)] will no longer be able to hold my faith against me."

column1: faith_conversion.1001.end.is_top_liege.convert_away0:"my most immediate concern is temporal — with most of my vassals following a different faith
column2: will I be able to keep my realm united against internal rebellions and foreign opportunists alike?"

column1: faith_conversion.1001.end.is_top_liege.convert_to0:"I can take comfort in knowing that the majority of my realm stands united under [new_faith.PantheonTerm]
faith_conversion.1001.b0:"At least I have [template_priest.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] to guide me..."
